issue.title: www.fileplanet.com

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.fileplanet.com/archive/p-19287/Half-Life-2-Friendly-Fire-Modification/download](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.fileplanet.com%2Farchive%2Fp-19287%2FHalf-Life-2-Friendly-Fire-Modification%2Fdownload) ### Comment > Some banner ads. > > Download page has interesting stuff. First there is a download button that downloads an .exe. After that is clicked, button turns into a blue link that downloads a .zip when clicked. > > I'm not sure if .exe is harmful or not but this site behaviour is indeed strange. ### Screenshots

issue.title: web.whatsapp.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://web.whatsapp.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fweb.whatsapp.com%2F) ### Comment > App Banner Advertisement and Notification Pop-up > > To reproduce, you need the following requirements: a) a smartphone with WhatsApp installed, b) an active WhatsApp account, c) at least one chat > > 1. Open WhatsApp, go to settings, connected devices, Add a device > 2. Scan the QR code on `web.whatsapp.com` > 3. When your chat loads, there is on the right the App advertisement (screenshot 1) > 4. now click on one chat that appear on the riight -> now you get a sticky App Downloadbanner on bottom of your contactlist (screenshot 2) > 5. On top there is a sticky begging to enable browser notification (you can enable in settings of the page if needed) > > The annoyance is, even when you click away, they reappearance when closing page and reload (even when store Cookies). When you use `web.whatsapp.com`, you obbviously don't want use the App from Microsoft store as this count for any Smartbanner. Username: `@Morku` ### Screenshots

No, I don't.

Personally I just remove a website from HTTPS exclusions list.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://web.whatsapp.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fweb.whatsapp.com%2F) ### Comment > App Banner Advertisement and Notification Pop-up > > To reproduce, you need the following requirements: a) a smartphone with WhatsApp installed, b) an active WhatsApp account, c) at least one chat > > 1. Open WhatsApp, go to settings, connected devices, Add a device > 2. Scan the QR code on `web.whatsapp.com` > 3. When your chat loads, there is on the right the App advertisement (screenshot 1) > 4. now click on one chat that appear on the riight -> now you get a sticky App Downloadbanner on bottom of your contactlist (screenshot 2) > 5. On top there is a sticky begging to enable browser notification (you can enable in settings of the page if needed) > > The annoyance is, even when you click away, they reappearance when closing page and reload (even when store Cookies). When you use `web.whatsapp.com`, you obbviously don't want use the App from Microsoft store as this count for any Smartbanner. Username: `@Morku` ### Screenshots

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://web.whatsapp.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fweb.whatsapp.com%2F) ### Comment > App Banner Advertisement and Notification Pop-up > > To reproduce, you need the following requirements: a) a smartphone with WhatsApp installed, b) an active WhatsApp account, c) at least one chat > > 1. Open WhatsApp, go to settings, connected devices, Add a device > 2. Scan the QR code on `web.whatsapp.com` > 3. When your chat loads, there is on the right the App advertisement (screenshot 1) > 4. now click on one chat that appear on the riight -> now you get a sticky App Downloadbanner on bottom of your contactlist (screenshot 2) > 5. On top there is a sticky begging to enable browser notification (you can enable in settings of the page if needed) > > The annoyance is, even when you click away, they reappearance when closing page and reload (even when store Cookies). When you use `web.whatsapp.com`, you obbviously don't want use the App from Microsoft store as this count for any Smartbanner. Username: `@Morku` ### Screenshots

issue.title: web.whatsapp.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://web.whatsapp.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fweb.whatsapp.com%2F) ### Comment > App Banner Advertisement and Notification Pop-up > > To reproduce, you need the following requirements: a) a smartphone with WhatsApp installed, b) an active WhatsApp account, c) at least one chat > > 1. Open WhatsApp, go to settings, connected devices, Add a device > 2. Scan the QR code on `web.whatsapp.com` > 3. When your chat loads, there is on the right the App advertisement (screenshot 1) > 4. now click on one chat that appear on the riight -> now you get a sticky App Downloadbanner on bottom of your contactlist (screenshot 2) > 5. On top there is a sticky begging to enable browser notification (you can enable in settings of the page if needed) > > The annoyance is, even when you click away, they reappearance when closing page and reload (even when store Cookies). When you use `web.whatsapp.com`, you obbviously don't want use the App from Microsoft store as this count for any Smartbanner. Username: `@Morku` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/lxsmdqqxhtcsks0coc0cokcowws880061dpk4vsbds.png?nc=1)

comment.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.body:
## Information

### Deutsch

Sehr geehrte Benutzerin, sehr geehrter Benutzer, aufgrund von Gesetzen ([z. B. die Gerichtsentscheidung in Karlsruhe, Deutschland im Jahre 2018](https://www.morgenpost.de/wirtschaft/article214069831/Karlsruhe-erlaubt-Werbeblocker.html)) ist es leider nicht möglich diese Paywall (Adblock-Erkennung) zu umgehen. Vielen Dank für Ihr Verständnis.

### English

Dear user, due to a court decision ([eg the court ruling in Karlsruhe, Germany in 2018](https://www.morgenpost.de/wirtschaft/article214069831/Karlsruhe-erlaubt-Werbeblocker.html) ) it is unfortunately not possible to bypass this paywall (adblock detection). Thank you for your understanding.

I'd call that phishing as it's trying to get the unwary to install unwanted and possibly malicious software. On d/l sites I always check the url, so did not catch me out this time. ### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://football.fantasysports.yahoo.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ffootball.fantasysports.yahoo.com%2F) ### Comment > Any time I click on the “view all” of “transaction trends”, the yahoo fantasy sports app immediately crashes. > > This just started happening with the new version 11.6.0 of the app. > > If I disable dns or use a different dns server, the app works and has an ad at the top of the page. Username: `@matthewjmiller1` ### Screenshots

It only happens when I'm using the filtering AdGuard DNS server and crashes consistently for that.

When I use the non-filter AdGuard DNS server, it doesn't crash and the attached screenshot is what it shoes. The ad at the top seems to be what gets filtered when the filtering server is used and it crashes.

@Alex-302 I DM'd you some logs from when it does and doesn't crash if that helps.

comment.body:
Hi. It is blocked as analytics.

You may add 
```
@@||taboola.com^$domain=taboolanews.com
@@||taboola.com^$elemhide
```
to user rules of `Ad Blocking` 
and to user rules of `DNS protection`:
```
@@||taboola.com^
```

comment.body:
You are right. On iOS only DNS filtering applied to apps.
Could you please test with AdGuard DNS server, but non-filtered, and with AdGuard DNS filter turned off?
* `Protection` => `DNS protection` => `DNS server` = `AdGuard DNS Non-Filtering`
* `Protection` => `DNS protection` => `DNS filtering` => `DNS filters` - disable `AdGuard DNS filter`

comment.body:
@matthewjmiller1 Received. Thanks.

I want to find what exactly breaks the app:
- using AdGuard DNS server (any, even non filtered)
- using AdGuard DNS filter.

I see in the log these domains (maybe not all requests made by this app):
- analytics.query.yahoo.com
- ads.flurry.com - blocked by AdGuard DNS default server and by DNS filter
- pubads.g.doubleclick.net - blocked by AdGuard DNS default server and by DNS filter
- beacon.shazam.com - blocked by AdGuard DNS default server and by DNS filter
- api-statcloud.a03.yahoodns.net - not blocked
- ad.doubleclick.net - blocked by AdGuard DNS default server and by DNS filter
- doubleclick.net - blocked by AdGuard DNS default server and by DNS filter
- yahoodns.net - not blocked
- data.emb-api.com - not blocked

You may try to block domains in user filter of DNS protection with a server, which does not break the app. Start with the first one.

The first case is harder, and we can't fix it by filters.
The second is "easy" - we need to find a filtering rule, which blocks a domain, and causes the application to crash.

---

Also you may try private AdGuard server with AdGuard DNS filter, and check in the query log status of requests (blocking/unblocking is possible).

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [https://www.hilton.com/en/hilton-honors/login/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.hilton.com%2Fen%2Fhilton-honors%2Flogin%2F)
### Comment
> I'm reaching out because I've encountered some issues while using AdGuard DNS on my Android device, specifically when browsing with Samsung Internet. When AdGuard DNS is enabled, I've noticed that the quick access icons on the homepage of Samsung Internet disappear, and the autofill feature, which I rely on heavily with Bitwarden, stops functioning properly. These issues only occur after completely uninstalling and reinstalling Samsung Internet, then toggling AdGuard DNS on. It's a bit of a bummer because these features are super useful in my day-to-day browsing.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/184282

issue.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

Ok. Now using the non-filter AdGuard DNS server, enable AdGuard DNS filter
in DNS Protection. Then clear the filtering log in Statistics (called
"Recent activity" or "Query log"), and reproduce the problem. After that,
go to the log, swipe down to refresh and make screenshot of blocked
requests (non-blocked requests can be hidden by search filters).

чт, 10 окт. 2024 г. в 16:08, Matt Miller ***@***.***>:
